text: Chicago P.D. is an American police action drama television series created by Dick Wolf and Matt Olmstead. It is part of Wolf Entertainment's Chicago franchise. The series premiered on NBC on January 8, 2014. It is about detectives and police officers who work for the Chicago Police Department. In addition to tracking down and arresting the cityâ€™s most violent offenders, members of the Intelligence Unit deal with professional and interpersonal pressures in and outside of their jobs. ==References== Category:2014 American television series debuts Category:Television series set in Chicago Category:Chicago (franchise)
title: Chicago P.D. (TV series)
